General.Name: Cape Industries Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: Cape Industries Ltd. manufactures and supplies cylinder liners for ship owners and engine builders in South Korea and internationally. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Yangsan, South Korea.

2.Name: Dong-Geun  Jung
2.Title: Head of the Factory and Director
